snippet: A midwife said her comment to a dying patient who had pleaded for a potentially lifesaving abortion — that Ireland was a Catholic country — had not been intended to be hurtful.
lead_paragraph: A midwife said her comment to a dying patient who had pleaded for a potentially lifesaving abortion — that Ireland was a Catholic country — had not been intended to be hurtful.

headline.seo: Religious Remark Confirmed in Irish Abortion Case
headline.main: Religious Remark Confirmed in Irish Abortion Case
headline.print_headline: Religious Remark Confirmed in Irish Abortion Case
